pkgmetadata.longdescription: # UPF to JSON converterUPF is a file format to describe atomic pseudo-potentials used by (DFT) densityfunctional theory codes. This package provides scripts for converting UPF v1 andUPF v2 (Unified Pseudopotential Format) to json format as required by the SIRIUSDFT library [SIRIUS github](https://github.com/electronic-structure/SIRIUS).More information about the unified pseudopotential format can be found here:https://www.quantum-espresso.org/pseudopotentials/unified-pseudopotential-format
